p: Leading investment firm is growing their Global Tech Development team and looking for Senior level Data Engineers. This is a great opportunity to join a team who truly takes pride in their work.

li: Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture
li.1: Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements focused on: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for better scalability, etc.
li.2: Build the infrastructure required for extraction, transformation, and loading of data from various data sources
li.3: Build analytic tools to provide actionable insights into key business performance metrics
li.4: Work with stakeholders across the business and technology to solve their data needs
li.5: Be responsible for key aspects of project delivery at a high level of quality

li: 4+ years of experience as a Data Engineer collaborating cross functionally across departments
li.1: Building and optimizing =E2=80=9CBig Data=E2=80=9D data pipelines, architectures and data sets (Java8+, Python, Scala, etc.)
li.2: AWS cloud services (EC2, ECS, EMR, S3, RDS, etc.)
li.3: ETL Orchestration Tools (Airflow, Glue, Luigi, NiFi, etc.)
li.4: SQL and NoSQL data store (PostgreSQL, MySQL, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch, etc.)
